basic_info.name: Facts and Figures of KKR and KSR Institute of Technology and Sciences
Why to join KKR and KSR Institute of Technology and Sciences?

Section.name: About KITS
Section.description:
KKR and KSR Institute of Technology and Sciences was established in 2008. The institute is affiliated to JNTU – K. The institute has been imparting the knowledge about the latest professional practices since its inception. With an eye on the changing trends and thereby maintaining the original standards, the institute has been nurturing students to become professionally equipped to face the global challenges. The institute has embedded the interactive learning pedagogies in the education system and has been delivering the most optimum student teacher ratio. The focus is to produce technocrats for global industry.
Founded in

2008

Private

How to Reach

5km from Guntur on Pratipadu road
Strategic Tie-Up’s – The college is associated to Corporate and MNCs like IBM and Infosys for training of the students.
Training Facility – The college offers different workshops and other interactive mediums to develop the capabilities of the students.
Industry Interface - The regularly visiting faculties provide an enriching experience of the industry environment.
Loan Facility – The facility of Educational loan is provided to students for pursuing various programs.

KITS, AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024.Courses: B.Tech Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
